  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Building
extends java.lang.Object
implements Visible, java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Building, in which all 
    BuildingObject
    s exist. Manages drawing of the individual objects. User-controlled character is controlled entirely through this class.
    Author:
    Logan Moore
